  • Method Details

    • saveProduct

      public void saveProduct(String productId, String productName, int price)
      This methods adds new product to the store and saves it. Here is created new product object which is saved in hashmap
      Parameters:
      productId - - unique identifier for product object
      productName - - name of the product
      price - - current price of the product

    • purchaseProduct

      public void purchaseProduct(String productId, int quantity, int price)
      This method defines logic of purchasing certain product at given price for the store If the product is not saved earlier it cannot be purchased
      Parameters:
      productId - - unique identifier for product object
      quantity - - integer of how many instances of this product have been purchased
      price - - integer number at which product has been purchased

    • orderProduct

      public void orderProduct(String productId, int quantity)
      Defines logic of ordering the product
      Parameters:
      productId - - unique identifier for product object
      quantity - - integer number of how many products consumer has oredered
